intro: Tarenna nitida, commonly known as the slender tarenna, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, round berries that turn from green to red as they mature. Tarenna nitida is often found in moist, shaded environments within the rainforest canopy.
